original: Anupādinnupādāniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁a nupādinnupādāniy aṃ ▁kusalaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na upādinn upādān iyo ▁na kusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi

original: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: ▁an upādinn a an upādān iyaṃ ▁kusalaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an upādinn a an upādān iyo ▁na kusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁cha ▁ adhipatiyā ▁cha ▁pe ▁avigate ▁cha

original: Anupādinnupādāniyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁a nupādinnupādāniy aṃ ▁akusal aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na upādinn upādān iyo ▁na akusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁ adhipatiyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi

original: Upādinnupādāniyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naupādinnupādāniyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: ▁upādinnupādāniy aṃ ▁abyākat aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paccayā ▁na upādinn upādān iyo ▁na a byākat o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁pañca ▁pe ▁avigate ▁pañca
